data.meta_description: We Will Tell You About MRMC Gulbarga 2024-25: Eligibility, Admission, Fees & Cutoff.
data.text:
About MRMC Gulbarga

As per the observation of Team GMU, MRMC Gulbarga is one of the oldest private medical colleges in Karnataka, known for its academics and patient exposure. On our visit to the MRMC Gulbarga, we observed that academics is really good, but the infrastructure somewhat disappointed us, patient inflow could have been better if they had changed the overall layout of the hospital along with its infrastructure.The hospital has the potential to attract more patients but somewhere the infrastructure is putting them behind.

When we interviewed students pursuing MBBS in MRMC Gulbarga, Team GMU discovered their dissatisfaction with the campus amenities. They expressed disappointment over the lack of sports and other facilities within the campus premises. Furthermore, there seems to be no evident progress towards improving these facilities. Moreover, the inconvenience of having the hostel and hospital situated outside the college campus was also noted as a drawback of MRMC Gulbarga.

In terms of finances, pursuing MBBS in MRMC Gulbarga proves to be economical, and the living conditions are notably favourable. Language barriers are minimal, as the community converses fluently in multiple languages, ensuring ease of communication for students studying here.

MRMC Gulbarga Highlights 2024

About How to get admission in MRMC Gulbarga for MBBS? Full Name of College MahadevappaRampure Medical College Gulbarga Type of Institution Private Affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences MRMC Gulbarga Popular Programme M.B.B.S Programme MBBS Total Seat Intake 150 MBBS Duration 5.5 Years Minimum Age for MBBS in MRMC Gulbarga 17 years (before 31stdec of the year of admission) Minimum Marks for MBBS in MRMC Gulbarga 50% marks (Physics + Chemistry + Biology

40% marks Mode of Examination NEET UG 2024 MRMC Hospitals 2 attached Teaching Hospital facilities: Basaveshwar Teaching & General Hospital, Gulbarga and Sangameshwar Teaching Hospital, Gulbarga MRMC Gulbarga Official Website https://mrmc.hkes.edu.in/

MRMC Gulbarga Location

MahadevappaRampure Medical College Gulbarga is situated on Sedam Road, along Mahadevappa Marg, in Kalaburagi, Karnataka 585105. The closest airport, Gulbarga Airport, is approximately 12.5km away. The nearest railway station, Kalaburagi Railway Station, is located around 3 km from the college. Additionally, the closest bus stop, Gulbarga Central Bus Stand, is about 3.3km away.

Programmes Offered at MRMC Gulbarga

MahadevappaRampure Medical College offers 1 undergraduate programme i.e. MBBS program with 150 seats per year (4.5 year course with a compulsory one-year rotating internship).

Additionally, MRMC Gulbarga offers various post-graduate programmes, namely-

Name of PG Course No. of PG Seats M.S. Anatomy 06 M.D. Physiology 02 M.D. Biochemistry 02 M.D. Pathology 10 M.D. Pharmacology 06 M.D. Microbiology 02 M.D. Forensic Medicine 02 M.D. Community Medicine 02 M.D. Medicine 12 M.D. Skin & VD 05 M.D. Paediatrics 09 M.S. Obst. &Gyanec 09 M.S. General Surgery 10 M.S. Orthopaedics 09 M.S. Ophthalmology 05 M.S. ENT 04 M.D. Radio Diagnosis 15 M.S. Anaesthesiology 15 M.D. Psychiatry 02

MRMC Gulbarga MBBS Fees 2024

Particulars MBBS Fees2024 MRMC Gulbarga MBBS Fees 2024 INR 10,92,852 /-

Eligibility Criteria for MBBS Admission in MRMC 2024

For admission to MRMC Medical College for MBBS, requires candidates to fulfil specific qualifying requirements before they get admitted. The following prerequisites are as follows:

1. Candidate must clear 12th standardwith Physics, Chemistry and Biology/ Bio-Technology as optional subjects and English as one of the languages of study, with at least 50% marks in aggregate of optional subjects.

2. The candidate should have completed 17 years of age as on December 31 of the year of admission.

3. The admission under the NRI category is based on merit in the qualifying examination taking into consideration, marks secured in the core subjects of Physics, Chemistry and Biology. Foreign nationals are also considered for admission under this quota.

4. Students seeking admission under the NRI category should submit a separate application to the college in the prescribed format. The payment of the fee shall be from the Non-Resident External (N.R.E) account of the parent.

5. Medical aspirant must be a citizen of India

6. For MBBS Admission in MRMC 2024, every medical student is required to register on the official website of the Karnataka Examinations Authority (KEA).

7. Medical aspirants must have qualified NEET UG 2024 exam.

MRMC Gulbarga MBBS AdmissionCriteria 2024

MBBS Admission in MRMC Gulbarga (General Merit Category)

For general merit category students, pursuing MBBS in MRMC Gulbarga will be done based on NEET 2024. The seats for MBBS will be provided by the Karnataka Examination Authority (KEA) through the process of centralized counselling.

MBBS Admission in MRMC Gulbarga (NRI Quota)

For NRI category students, admission to MBBS in MRMC Gulbarga is based on the NEET UG 2024 Ranking. Thus, foreign nationals are also considered eligible for admission under this quota after they quality NEET exam followed by online registration and document verification by KEA, Bangalore.

MRMC Gulbarga MBBS Admission Process 2024

The process applicable for students interested in pursuing MBBS in MRMC Gulbarga is as follows-

Following are the steps involved in MRMC Gulbarga MBBS Admission Process 2024 namely-

STEP 1: Register on the official website of KEA i.e. kea.kar.nic.inand then login using ID and password.

STEP 2: Fill out the Karnataka NEET Counselling 2024 application form and don’t forget to take a printout of the online application by paying the fees

STEP 3: Upload the required set of documents such as NEET Admit Card, rank card, 12th marksheet, signature of parents and student as well as thumb impression of student along with his or her photograph

STEP 4: After uploading all the documents, a secret key will be given and a student will be required to download the document verification slip.

STEP 5: With the downloaded document verification slip, a medical aspirant can then start the process of choice filling online.

STEP 6: After the declaration of the mock test, choices made can be either reshuffled or deleted but cannot be added.

STEP 7: And when the final result is declared, a student can then proceed to pay application fee.

STEP 8: The last step is Reporting. After the Karnataka NEET first round of counselling results, students should report to the Karnataka Examination Authority before going to the college.

Documents Required for MBBS Admission in MRMC 2024

The documents required for MBBS Admission in MahadevappaRampure Medical College (MRMC Gulbarga) 2024 are as follows-

• 10th mark sheet

• 12th mark sheet

• Allotment Letter

• Admit Card

• Rank Letter

• Transfer & Character Certificate

• Caste Certificate (if applicable)

• Medical Fitness Certificate

• Self-Attested Photo Copy of Aadhaar Card or other ID Card

MRMC Gulbarga NEET UG Expected Cutoff 2024

Particulars NEET UG Expected Cutoff Rank2024 MRMC Gulbarga MBBSExpected Cutoff 2024 60000 - 65000

MRMC Gulbarga NEET UG Cutoff 2023

Particulars NEET UGCutoff Rank 2023 MRMC Gulbarga MBBS Cutoff 2023 53840

Consult GMU for Admission in MRMC Gulbarga 2024

To inquire about MBBS Admission in MRMC Gulbarga for the year 2024, please contact Team Get My University. Team GMU will provide you with all the information regarding the MRMC Gulbarga MBBS Admission Process 2024, eligibility criteria, required documents, and any other details related to securing MBBS admission in MRMC Gulbarga for the upcoming academic year.
